name: Don't Write Your Passwords Down
description: In the age of information being more valuable than presious metals, it is imparitive you do not share log in credentials with anyone. Writing your password down on a post-it and sticking it to the bottom of your keyboard it a big no-no!

name: Stay Away From Sus Websited
description: Browsing the web is a lot like walking through a densly populated city. There are countless people and business to interact with but you know better than to interact with the sus ones

name: If You Don't Know What You're Doing, Buy an iPad
description: For the last time, Grandma doesn't need a new computer. You have cleared CandyCrush Saga mailware off of her system too many times. It's time to get her a device that she will have a harder time ruining
